title: Marovo (1977) Genesis Portion
description: Marovo is an Austronesian language of the Solomon Islands. It is spoken in the New Georgia Group on islands in Marovo Lagoon and on the neighbouring islands of New Georgia, Vangunu and Nggatokae. The usual word order in sentences is verb-subject-object.
provider: The Bible Society in the South Pacific

language.name: Marovo
language.area: Western Province, south New Georgia Island, Marovo Lagoon, Vangunu Island, and Nggatokae Island.
